UICOMP is known for its small class sizes, rigorous curriculum and hands-on clerkships. New Curriculum A new and innovative curriculum is being rolled out across the entire College of Medicine, providing earlier clinical experiences. Graduate Medical Education The University of Illinois College of Medicine Peoria is the sponsoring institution of 13 residencies and 9 fellowships. UICOMP has nearly 300 residents and fellows in the GME programs in partnership with our affiliate hospitals. Continuing Medical Education The College of Medicine is accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME).
